description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Dead Words: When Vocabulary Goes Extinct.

buildup.text: When objects disappear (codpieces, cassettes), their names often follow into obscurity.

discovery.text: 'Snollygoster' (a shrewd politician) and 'ultracrepidarian' (one who gives opinions beyond expertise) are nearly gone.

twist.text: Some dead words are revived â€” 'podcast' resurrected 'broadcast,' and 'ghost' as a verb came back via dating culture.

climax.text: Every word that dies takes a tiny piece of cultural knowledge with it.

punchline.text: Words are born, they live, and they die â€” just slower than the people who speak them.
